review:
Highly satisfied with the entire procedure carried out.

Doctors are outright professionals taking great care of the patient.

My procedure took about a hour and a half in total and the doctors took very good care throughout.

The complications in my extraction were well exppained in the beginning and the process being carried out was also being explained as we went along.

Overall the procedure was more or less painless. 

Will definitely recommend SouthEx Dental to everyone looking for good dental care.
reply_text: Thank you Surya for your kind words. Truly appreciate. Thanks

tags: None
review: My experience with Dr. Saurabh Gupta was good.  He was not referred to me by anyone. I completely depended on the information provided in the net and feedback given by some of his earlier patients.  Initially he has done very good cleaning of my teeth to my satisfaction in two sittings.  Next, he extracted two of my bad teeth and two partially broken teeth by giving proper anaesthesia. After coming back to home, I did not feel any pain or discomfort at the extracted place.  I still have to undergo some treatment such as bridging the missing teeth and implantation.  So far, my experience has been good.  He is very gentle in treatment and gives motivation to the patient.
reply_text:
Thank you for appreciating our work. We strive to provide a sincere advice and quality work to our esteemed patients.
Regards
Dr Saurabh
